TextLibrary.Text: Bane! I should have guessed you were behind this Dragon's disappearance. Tell me where she is!
Bane! I should have guessed you were behind this Dragon's disappearance. Tell me where she is!
Bane! I should have guessed you were behind this Dragon's disappearance. Tell me where she is!
Bane! I should have guessed you were behind this Dragon's disappearance. Tell me where she is!
I will do better than TELL you, mortal. I will SHOW you.
I will do better than TELL you, mortal. I will SHOW you.
I will do better than TELL you, mortal. I will SHOW you.
I will do better than TELL you, mortal. I will SHOW you.
I can turn any creature into an Undead beast. A Dragon is no exception. Here - meet Crystal... though I doubt she even remembers that name any longer...
